snippet: Scientists have discovered micro-organisms beneath the ocean floor that apparently have not evolved for a very long time.
abstract: Dr J William Schopf study in journal Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences reports that bacteria living beneath ocean floor appear not to have evolved for two billion years due to static nature of their environment.
lead_paragraph: Scientists have discovered micro-organisms beneath the ocean floor that apparently have not evolved for a very long time.

headline.print_headline: Fossils: Unchanged for More Than Two Billion Years
headline.main: Unchanged for More Than Two Billion Years

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
